p: Makhlouf et al. [ 97] performed antioxidant activity analysis of fixed oil from three acorn species grown in Algeria: Quercus ilex L, Quercus suber L, and Quercus coccifera L and observed that oils methanolic extracts had remarkable antioxidant activity, up to 3.34 and 3.79 µmol TE g−1 oil in the DPPH and ABTS tests, respectively.
